eu.amidst.flinklink.core.learning.parametric

Interface ParameterLearningAlgorithm

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedVI, dVMP, dVMPv1, ParallelMaximumLikelihood, ParallelMaximumLikelihood2, ParallelVB, StochasticVI

    public interface ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    This interface defines the Algorithm for learning the BayesianNetwork parameters.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#learningexample

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BN_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getLogMarginalProbability

        double getLogMarginalProbability()
        Returns the log marginal probability.
        Returns:
        the log marginal probability.

      • updateModel

        double updateModel(DataFlink<DataInstance> dataFlink)
        Updates the model using a given DataFlink object.
        Parameters:
        dataFlink - a DataFlink object.
        Returns:
        the log-probability of the data instances of the data. Or Double.NaN if this log-probability can not be estimated.

      • initLearning

        void initLearning()
        Initializes the parameter learning process.

      • setDAG

        void setDAG(DAG dag)
        Sets the DAG structure.
        Parameters:
        dag - a directed acyclic graph DAG.

      • setSeed

        void setSeed(int seed)
        Sets the seed using a single int seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - the initial seed.

      • getLearntBayesianNetwork

        BayesianNetwork getLearntBayesianNetwork()
        Returns the learnt BayesianNetwork model.
        Returns:
        the learnt BayesianNetwork model.

      • setOutput

        void setOutput(boolean activateOutput)
        Sets the Output.
        Parameters:
        activateOutput - true if the output is activated, false otherwise.

      • getBatchSize

        int getBatchSize()
        Returns the batch size.
        Returns:
        the window size.

      • setBatchSize

        void setBatchSize(int windowsSize)
        Sets the batch size.
        Parameters:
        windowsSize - the window size.
